page.title: 05THE MILK MARKETING BOARD
page.content: The Milk Marketing Board which has offices in the Broadway was founded in October 1957 by the local {farmers. Vans from the M.M.B. go to farms, {dairies}etc. They take three samples of milk from each{cow.}Each sample has about 25 ml of milk which is put in a plastic test-tube. These test-tubes are labelled with the name of the cow and its owner. One of the test-tubes has a preservative to stop it turning sour. The other two are kept cold so that if any{bacteria}are in the milk they will not spread. The milk van then returns to the Milk Marketing Board's {laboratories.
